amendment.description: Amendment enhances the existing cybersecurity workforce assessment by including contractors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 111-410 to enhance the existing cybersecurity workforce assessment by including contractors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Clarke.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clarke amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
